verbose_text: We find that RNAi mediated KD of SFT2D2, ZDHHC5, or GRINA all lead to an increase in the CIMPR fluorescence intensity although GRINA KD markedly reduces TGN46 staining.
evidence: KD of SFT2D2, ZDHHC5, or GRINA all lead to an increase in the CIMPR fluorescence intensity although GRINA KD markedly reduces TGN46
